c74object.name: ears.hoa.mirror~
c74object.description: Performs a mirroring in the higher-order ambisonic domain

method.name: list/llll
method.description:
A list or llll in the first inlet is supposed to contain buffer names and will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).
A number or an llll in the second, third, or fourth inlet is expected to receive the yaw, pitch and roll parameters or envelopes (also see envampunit).

method.name: number
method.description: A number in the second, third or fourth inlet respectively sets the yaw, pitch and roll

attribute.name: axis
attribute.description: Sets the mirroring axis. None = no mirroring; X mirrors left-right; Y mirrors front-back; Z mirrors top-bottom.

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: Sets the dimension (order will then be inferred from the number of input channels).

c74object.discussion: The normalization convention is SN2D or SN3D (depending on the dimension), the channel order is ACN.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: The normalization convention is SN2D or SN3D (depending on the dimension), the channel order is ACN.
